prompt_base: photograph of a cute baby sucking a red pacifier, small body, blue dress, single hair strand, yellow humanoid skin, big expressive eyes, 8k
feature_prompt: subtle skin imperfections, peach fuzz, realistic cotton texture on the dress, sharp focus on pacifier
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, big child, adult, low quality, long hair, extra limbs
